craftable & limited items.name: Flash Grenade
craftable & limited items.description:
Craft-able & Limited Item.
Craft-able when using Flashbang.Detonates with a loud bang and flashing lights:
Can be used as a distraction of blinding device.
Creates a Loud Noise notification.
The Flash Grenade has 1 Charge.

craftable & limited items.name: Vaccine
craftable & limited items.description:
Limited Item.
Can be found in Supply Crates:
Cures Contamination.
The Vaccine has 1 Charge.

firecrackers.name: Chinese Firecracker
firecrackers.description:
A row of small explosive devices wrapped in heavy paper casing.
Detonates into loud bangs and intense light flashes:
Can be used as a distraction, as a blinding device or to celebrate.
The Chinese Firecracker has 1 Charge.

firecrackers.name: Winter Party Starter
firecrackers.description:
A small, highly-explosive dinner table decoration.
Detonates into loud bangs and intense light flashes:
Can be used as a distraction, as a blinding device or to celebrate.
The Winter Party Starter has 1 Charge.

firecrackers.name: Third Year Party Starter
firecrackers.description:
A small, highly-explosive dinner table decoration.
Detonates into loud bangs and intense light flashes, and playful confetti:
Can be used as a distraction, as a blinding device or to celebrate our three years together.
The Third Year Party Starter has 1 Charge.
"Happy Anniversary! Here's to our three years together!" — The Dead by Daylight Team

flashlights.name: Flashlight
flashlights.description:
A standard Flashlight.
Can be used to light your way in the darkness.
The Flashlight lasts for 8 seconds.
"Most of the battery life was wastefully used by the previous owner."

flashlights.name: Sport Flashlight
flashlights.description:
A very portable Flashlight with a good grip.
Its efficient technology produces a powerful light while consuming less power.
Slightly increases Aim accuracy.
Slightly decreases Battery Consumption rate.
The Sport Flashlight lasts for 8 seconds.

flashlights.name: Utility Flashlight
flashlights.description:
A sturdy but heavy Flashlight that packs a lot of power.
Moderately increases Visual brightness.
Moderately increases Blinded duration.
Slightly decreases Aim accuracy.
The Utility Flashlight lasts for 12 seconds.

flashlights.name: Will O' Wisp
flashlights.description:
A Flashlight equipped with a special lens cover that adds an orange tint and a little Ghost to the beam.
Considerably increases friendly Ghosts in your life.
The Will O' Wisp lasts for 8 seconds.
"Happy Trick or Treating!"

flashlights.name: Anniversary Flashlight
flashlights.description:
A festive Flashlight.
Explodes with confetti upon blinding a Killer. Surprise!
The Anniversary Flashlight lasts for 8 seconds.
"Happy Anniversary! Here's to many more!" — The Dead by Daylight Team

keys.name: Broken Key
keys.description:
The bow and shank of a key, vibrating with power.
The Broken Key's power cannot be triggered by itself.Various objects can be attached to its jump ring, which channels the Broken Key's power into various effects:
Must be equipped with Add-ons to unlock its Aura-reading abilities.
Cannot be used to open a closed Hatch.
The Broken Key's Aura-reading abilities can be used for 10 seconds.

keys.name: Dull Key
keys.description:
A bent and dull Key that once held great power.
The Dull Key's power cannot be triggered by itself.Various objects can be attached to its jump ring, which channels the Dull Key's remaining power into various effects:
Must be equipped with Add-ons to unlock its Aura-reading abilities.
Can be consumed to open a closed Hatch, if not depleted of Charges.
The Dull Key's Aura-reading abilities can be used for 5 seconds.

keys.name: Skeleton Key
keys.description:
A tarnished and crooked Key, vibrating with ominous power.
The Skeleton Key's power cannot be triggered by itself.Various objects can be attached to its jump ring, which channels the Skeleton Key's power into various effects:
Must be equipped with Add-ons to unlock its Aura-reading abilities.
Can be consumed to open a closed Hatch, if not depleted of Charges.
The Skeleton Key's Aura-reading abilities can be used for 30 seconds.

maps.name: Map
maps.description:
An old piece of parchment made out of a skin-like material that is rolled and sealed with an uncoloured leather string.
Holding and channelling the Map unlocks great potential in your Aura-reading abilities, revealing the Aura of all tracked objects at the cost of slowly burning it.
Start the Trial with 1 Generator tracked.
The Map tracks any of the following objects:
Generators within 8 metres.
Generators, Chests, and Totems revealed by Detective's Hunch.
The Map lasts for 20 seconds.

maps.name: Rainbow Map
maps.description:
An piece of parchment made out of oddly fresh skin with blood on its edge that has yet to dry, and that is rolled and sealed with multiple coloured ropes and cords.
Holding and channelling the Rainbow Map unlocks great potential in your Aura-reading abilities, revealing the Aura of all tracked objects at the cost of slowly burning it.
Start the Trial with 3 random objects tracked.
The Rainbow Map tracks any of the following objects:
Exit Gate Switches, Generators, and the Hatch when you come within 8 metres.
Various Killer Belongings when you come within 8 metres
Generators, Chests, and Totems revealed by Detective's Hunch.
The Rainbow Map lasts for 20 seconds.
"It disheartens me. All this unspeakable knowledge and gruelling effort and yet nothing tangible, nothing usable to get out of this nightmare." — Vigo's Journal

medkits.name: Camping Aid Kit
medkits.description:
A rudimentary First Aid Kit which can save lives in emergencies, even if it's lacking some of its supplies.
Unlocks the Self-Heal action.
Moderately increases Altruistic Healing speed.
The Camping Aid Kit has 16 Charges.
"Barely has enough material for a decent patch-up."

medkits.name: First Aid Kit
medkits.description:
A standard First Aid Kit with all the necessary equipment for treating common to more serious injuries.
Unlocks the Self-Heal action.
Considerably increases Altruistic Healing speed.
The First Aid Kit has 24 Charges.

medkits.name: Emergency Med-Kit
medkits.description:
A sturdy and well organised Med-Kit equipped with top condition emergency supplies.
Unlocks the Self-Heal action.
Tremendously increases Self-Healing speed.
Tremendously increases Altruistic Healing speed.
The Emergency Med-Kit has 16 Charges.
"There is a cure for almost everything...but not for this."

medkits.name: Ranger Med-Kit
medkits.description:
A large metal box containing medical supplies aimed at emergency rescues in hard to reach, often isolated locations.
Unlocks the Self-Heal action.
Tremendously increases Altruistic Healing speed.
Moderately increases Skill Check success zones.
Moderately increases Skill Check bonus zones.
The Ranger Med-Kit has 32 Charges.
"A small engraved label can be found glued to the back panel: VK.ID-3994723."

medkits.name: All Hallows' Eve Lunchbox
medkits.description:
A plastic lunchbox with phosphorescent Halloween Stickers that has been packed with First-Aid equipment.
Unlocks the Self-Heal action.
Makes you considerably more visible.
Considerably increases Altruistic Healing speed.
The All Hallows' Eve Lunchbox has 24 Charges.
"Safety first! Make sure you can be seen when trick or treating."

medkits.name: Anniversary Med-Kit
medkits.description:
A festive Med-Kit.
Explodes with confetti upon fully healing a Survivor. Surprise!
Unlocks the Self-Heal action.
Considerably increases Altruistic Healing speed.
The Anniversary Med-Kit has 24 Charges.
"Happy Anniversary! Here's to many more!" — The Dead by Daylight Team

toolboxes.name: Worn-Out Tools
toolboxes.description:
A metal box containing out of condition tools that could break at any moment.Even without training, can be used to repair or break various mechanical components.
Moderately increases Repair speed.
Slightly decreases Skill Check success zones.
Unlocks the Sabotage action.
Considerably decreases Item efficiency.
The Worn-Out Toolbox has 16 Charges.
"You call these tools?... Really?"

toolboxes.name: Toolbox
toolboxes.description:
A metal box containing a set of basic tools.Even without training, can be used to repair or break various mechanical components.
Moderately increases Repair speed.
Unlocks the Sabotage action.
Slightly increases Sabotage speed.
Considerably decreases Item efficiency.
The Toolbox has 20 Charges.
"It is unclear as to where these tools come from. Were they brought in by one of us or did they belong to one of the monsters?"

toolboxes.name: Mechanic's Toolbox
toolboxes.description:
A metal box with specialised mechanics tools.Even without training, can be used to repair or break various mechanical components.
Considerably increases Repair speed.
Unlocks the Sabotage action.
Slightly decreases Sabotage speed.
Considerably decreases Item efficiency.
The Mechanic's Toolbox has 16 Charges.

toolboxes.name: Commodious Toolbox
toolboxes.description:
A large metal box containing basic tool and extra mechanical parts.Even without training, can be used to repair or break various mechanical components.
Moderately increases Repair speed.
Unlocks the Sabotage action.
Considerably decreases Item efficiency.
The Commodious Toolbox has 32 Charges.

toolboxes.name: Engineer's Toolbox
toolboxes.description:
A metal box with highly specialised tools meant for engineering.Most of the tools can be used by neophytes to make quick repairs or break various mechanical components.
Tremendously increases Repair speed.
Unlocks the Sabotage action.
Moderately decreases Sabotage speed.
Considerably decreases Item efficiency.
The Engineer's Toolbox has 16 Charges.
"I've created tools beyond compare and stood paralysed as they were stolen from me. These are but a poor replica, spat out by The Fog." — Vigo's Journal

toolboxes.name: Alex's Toolbox
toolboxes.description:
A metal box containing mainly saws and vice grips of varying sizes but also other tools.Even though the content of this Toolbox is clearly aimed at destructive deeds, it can be used to repair various mechanical components as well.
Slightly increases Repair speed.
Unlocks the Sabotage action.
Considerably increases Sabotage speed.
Considerably decreases Item efficiency.
Alex's Toolbox has 24 Charges.
"Most of the tools are identified as 'owned by Alex'."

toolboxes.name: Anniversary Toolbox
toolboxes.description:
A Toolbox that is slightly explosive.
Moderately increases Repair speed.
Detonates a firework once depleted. Yay!
Unlocks the Sabotage action.
Considerably decreases Item efficiency.
The Anniversary Toolbox has 32 Charges.
"Nothing says happy anniversary like detonating a firework and praying the Killer doesn't notice.Good luck and thank you for celebrating with us!" — The Dead by Daylight Team

toolboxes.name: Festive Toolbox
toolboxes.description:
A Toolbox packed to the brim with fireworks, it's prepared to celebrate all your life's successes... and failures.
Moderately increases Repair speed.
Succeeding a Great Skill Check detonates a small cluster of firecrackers.
Missing a Skill Check detonates fireworks.
Unlocks the Sabotage action.
Considerably decreases Item efficiency.
The Festive Toolbox has 32 Charges.
